H0.text: With a total of 49 who is the England team’s all-time top try scorer. Jonny Wilkinson

H1.text: With a total of 49 who is the England team’s all-time top try scorer. Jason Robinson

H2.text: With a total of 49 who is the England team’s all-time top try scorer. Josh Lewsey

H3.text: With a total of 49 who is the England team’s all-time top try scorer. Rory Underwood

A4.text: Rory Underwood holds the record for most tries scored for England, with 49 tries – placing him sixth all-time in international rugby.
